PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15852010-12-09,  HC,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
Subject Exemption from residency requirements - HIV-infected persons and Thalidomide Victims Assistance
PrecisOrder which exempts an individual from the residency requirements of the HIV-INFECTED PERSONS AND THALIDOMIDE VICTIMS ASSISTANCE ORDER and thus renders him eligible to receive the benefits provided for therein.
AttachmentsAttachment
